Summary:
The CL team is working on implementing the Bellatrix upgrade. The mainnet merge testnets are being prepared and will be launched soon.

A new version of the consensus layer client (geth) has been released to support the upcoming changes. 

There was discussion about the status of devnet, which should now have a more stable environment for testing.

The team is also working on implementing the Capy protocol upgrade in preparation for mainnet deployment.
